quotes.text: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.

quotes.text: It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight.

quotes.text: All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others.

quotes.text: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.text: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.text: There is no friend as loyal as a book.

quotes.text: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are strong at the broken places.

quotes.text: You have to die a few times before you can really live.

quotes.text: It's no wonder that truth is stranger than fiction. Fiction has to make sense.

quotes.text: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.

quotes.text: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
